name: Trainz Auran Texture File
summary: A TEXTURE file contains texture information about an object used by various 3D train simulation games in the Trainz series. It stores information in the binary Auran texture format that configures the display behavior of the texture and one or more texture component images (typically .JPG, .BMP, or .TGA files). TEXTURE files may be utilized for any object that appears in the Trainz game, such as train cars, planes, ships, cars, people, animals, buildings, bridges, and trees.
